content: The real question is: why would Tom invent a cloning machine and clone himself so many times, just to continue doing mundane tasks again?
translations: ita:La vera domanda è﹕ perché Tom dovrebbe inventare una macchina per la clonazione e clonarsi così tante volte, solo per co
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by espamatics (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
